content:
You can attach a few files for test decryption by packing them into an archive with zip, rar, tar, 7zip, 7z, tar.gz extensions of no more than 10 megabytes using the attach button directly in the chat.

If your archive weighs more than 10 megabytes, please use our file sharing service.
http://lockbitfss2w7co3ij6am6wox4xcurtgwukunx3yubcoe5cbxiqakxqd.onion
http://lockbitfsvf75glg226he5inkfgtuoakt4vgfhd7nfgghx5kwz5zo3ad.onion
http://lockbitfskq2fxclyfrop5yizyxpzu65w7pphsgthawcyb4gd27x62id.onion
For security reasons we do not click on other links you send in chat.
Please wait for a reply, sometimes it takes several hours due to possible time zone differences.
We found your note, what happens now?
Soon we'll send you partial data listing, you can pick 3 filenames as a proof that we have your data.
Okay Standing by.
Thank you. We need to review this, but it is the weekend and no one is here.
Okay.
Any news?

Our team has selected the following files for to provide to us:

ACCOUNTING/10Q and 10K/FY 2024 10-Qs/Q3 2024/Press Release/HNNA Earnings Release Q3 2024 v4 (07 30 2024) (legal edits).docx

 TRADING/Analysis/Annual Report Narratives/ Technology Fund 2022 Performance Narrative v1.docx

 COMPLIANCE/Periodic Reports – HFs/Form N-1A (Registration Statement)/ Industry Concentration Analysis and Turnover Rates (updated through 2023 11 30).xlsx
this information will be downloaded and assessed.
Okay
how much data did you take from us?
Around 50 GB. Enough to destroy your reputation.
will advise the leadership.
Price: $4,500,000 in BTC.
will advise the leadership
downloading.
Any news?
information has been given to our team. our it team is selecting encrypted files to test.
Okay. not important files, up to 3.
Okay.
We have selected files for testing:
We will download the File Samples. Its late into the weekend and the team will not be together again until next week to review what you have provided.
Okay.
Any news?
Our team is reviewing the data you provided. Leadership wanted to inquire if you can provide assistance with a discounted amount?
We can give a discount but you will have to pay within 10 days. Final price: $4,000,000.
Taking information to my team.
Ok.
Your final price does not allow much flexibility. We find this amount very difficult to meet.
Your insurance covers 5MM. We ask 4MM with discount.
We're already down 20% from the price listed on the insurance. We are not charity. 9 days left for discount, use your time wisely.
7 days.*
Our team will be assembled to address this matter. We ask that you discontinue sending email to our employees. This is where we converse.
Okay.
We also asked our call centers to stop calling. Hope they didn't. If you want to go everything smoothly, you have to update us in time.
The team will be updated.
3 days left for the discount.
Our team has met and we find that our policy does not expressly make funds available for a payment when there are existing riders to get us up and running. Your demand does not allow for that.

Your answer is unclear. We need a straight explanation: what exactly is stopping the payment? If there are specific conditions, name them — or let me ask another way: should we start publishing your data?

That policy does not expressly make funds available for ransom payment. There are other considerations that are expressed in the policy like restoration & remediation support to assist with us becoming operational and liability issues. We do not want you to publish data either. Our team will be meeting mid-week to fully assess our options.

Your own policy (section “Cyber Extortion — We will pay on your behalf cyber extortion expenses”) guarantees funds for ransom.
Your choice: one clean payment or months of lawsuits, fines, and shareholder rage.
Forward this to your insurer and settle, or watch your reputation disintegrate in real time.
Our OSINT team collecting contacts of regulators, journalists, and competitors for the data drop in case you refuse to pay.
